PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-06792010-05-27,  ,  CIC,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Citizenship and Immigration Act
SubjectAgreement for Canada-Nova Scotia Cooperation on Immigration
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration to enter into an agreement with the Province of Nova Scotia to amend the current AGREEMENT FOR CANADA-NOVA SCOTIA COOPERATION ON IMMIGRATION by adding an annex regarding temporary foreign workers. The purpose of the Agreement is to implement mechanisms to facilitate the entry of temporary foreign workers into Nova Scotia and to improve temporary foreign worker program efficiency and integrity.
AttachmentsAttachment
